column4: In sreen, my backspace doesn't work. I have to use ctrl+h. Does anyone know how to fix this?
check your key bindings in /etc/screenrc
nothin that I can tell
I checked my screenrc, i don't see anything for backspace... not sure what else you can try besides re-installing.
#screen might have more info.
i'm trying purging and reisntalling now. I've found and reported bugs on this on LP as well
other peopel have been ahving this problem for a year
#screen is a good diea - thanks
what version of screen are you using? I have 4.00.02 loaded.
the maintainer reported old versions being fine and maybe it was newer versions
reinstalling didnt help =/
Can you force a 02 install?
yea I'll do 02
will you find the package version for me of screen?
Sure, what exactly do you need?
the package version number that you have
from apt-cache show screen: Filename: pool/main/s/screen/screen_4.0.2-4.1ubuntu5_i386.deb   Thats from Dapper repos.
ah your not on feisty?
no sir
ok I'll add that repo then. thanks mate
